mapper.insert: insert into board_tbl values( board_seq.nextval, 'test', #{boardName}, #{categoryNo}, #{boardContent}, #{boardPrice}, to_char(sysdate,'yyy-mm-dd'), #{accountWriter}, #{accountName}, #{accountBank}, to_date(#{boardStart},'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{boardEnd},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{referenceLink}, to_date(#{deliveryDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{boardEtc}, 1, 0 )
